F-16s are fly-by-wire, but if they have a shut down - the pilots can punch out . . . ! Jumbo civilian people movers should have 100% manual back up controls. If they don't, don't get on 'em - - Wandering and Wondering

F-16s are fly-by-wire, but if they have a shut down - the pilots can punch out . . . ! Jumbo civilian people movers should have 100% manual back up controls. If they don't, don't get on 'em - - Wandering and Wondering
